content:
Dear Eng. Mohamed,

Thank you for your email and feedback regarding the app. We are pleased to hear that most of the issues have been resolved and the app is now functioning smoothly.

Regarding the issues you have raised:

We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Our team has reviewed and resolved the issue. The app will now only display products that are available in stock.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have reviewed and made the necessary changes. Please note that the search and filter are for category names only and not for products.

We are glad to hear that the banners are working correctly now. Our team has also resolved the issue with the links in the backend app image section.

Our team has reviewed and resolved the issue. The cart will now function correctly even if the client is not logged in.

Thank you for pointing this out. We have made the necessary changes to update the label from "أستمارة التواصل" to "نموذج التواصل".

Our team has reviewed and resolved the small gray space issue on top of every screen.

Regarding the support period, we understand your concerns. However, please note that we delivered the documentation and the Android version two months ago, and we have been providing support since then. We also uploaded the Android version, and we are currently working on IOS. We have requested designs two months ago, and we have only received them a week ago.

We kindly request that we arrange a delivery meeting, and we need to migrate the plugin and prepare the production environment.

Thank you for your patience and understanding. Please note that the support period has started from 16-2-2023.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
